QuestData.Title: Troll Patrol: Throwing Down
QuestData.Description: Clever...$b$bJust when it seemed we were getting things under control, they tunneled right underneath us and secured the shrine!$b$bNow we're caught between two nethurbian armies and our predicament is worsening by the minute.$b$bAs our first course of action, we must stop them from reinforcing. Their tunnels must be sealed.$b$bTake these grenades and throw them down their craters to the northwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Rupert at Drak'Sotra wants you to use High Impact Grenades near 5 Nethurbian Craters.
QuestData.RewardText: We're not out of the woods by any means, but your efforts have helped to slow the enemy down.$b$bCaptain Grondel up in Drak'Agal will likely have need of you.$b$bFarewell, $n.
